attributes.action: Work together with all Nations for World Peace, starting with the removal of British troops from conflict areas of the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are members of the 'Make Love Not War' group currently found on Facebook. We believe if we all work together and stop fighting and killing each other we can acheive greatness and we can remove poverty, starvation and other unnecessary suffering from around the world. Yes I know it's a big ask but Peace , Love and a Common interest have got to be better than continued killing, suffering and the feeling of hopelessness. 
We not only desire peace, we demand it.
Peaceful regards from
Gareth Marchant 
(creator of Make Love Not War group)
